title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for a series
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed to notify the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to notify the user.
SR:
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column that does not contain any data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
